name: visitor.toml

role.name: Visitor
role.description: Unauthenticated user viewing documentation and prototype

rawContent:
# Visitor Role

[role]
id = "visitor"
name = "Visitor"
description = "Unauthenticated user viewing documentation and prototype"
level = 0

[permissions]
list = [
  "view:docs",
  "view:prototype"
]
